description:
Your potential customers respond 10x better to video than text. If you're not making videos for them, then your competition certain is!

Creating amazing video for your business doesn't have to be expensive or challenging.

You can produce "almost professional" videos with just your Mac, iMovie, smartphone, a low-cost microphone, and some creative techniques.

I want to help you create product demos, viral marketing campaigns, screen capture tutorials, teaser clips, sales videos, investor pitches, and so much more.

Here's your chance to bypass the learning curve, skip the expensive setup, and get straight to making videos that engage, inform, and sell. Throughout this course you will get:

  • Simple, clear and precise "how-to" instructions
  • Secret tips and tricks to maximize iMovie's capabilities
  • Complete guide to create more than 7 different projects
  • Great resources to help you create stunning presentations
  • Insider tips in making incredible videos that stick
  • And so much more..

Of course, you can also apply the same tips and tricks to create home videos that will impress just about anyone at that next birthday party or barbeque!

Signup for this course now, and kickstart your awesome video marketing campaigns.
title: Create Professional YouTube Videos on a Budget!
